evidence_in_dialogue: [[Agent_Rick_Culpepper]] there 's not many guys who would hand the case over to us fibbies
[[Brass]] he comes back five grand richer
[[Brass]] he comes back five grand richer
[[Agent_Rick_Culpepper]] best thing you could do for your boss -- protect him from himself
[[Syd_Goggle]] you know , the thing with women ... is they work out because they want us to look at them
